data.eml:eml: New cocalodine jumping spiders from Papua New Guinea (Araneae: Salticidae: Cocalodinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maddison, Wayne P. (2009): New cocalodine jumping spiders from Papua New Guinea (Araneae: Salticidae: Cocalodinae). Zootaxa 2021: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186069
